column4: Does anyone know some good software to fix id3v1 tags? So that I can select an entire album and set the album name for all the files without having to do it for each file separately?
nice.. I'll take a look at it
hello... quick question. I managed to f* up this somehow. I booted X with alt+ctrl+backspace, but it just closed x without rebooting it... how can I get back to the login screen?
do as HappyFool says, after switching to a virtual console
